dict.string:
Made by Kevin M. Lawson http://kevinmlawson.com/
Source contributions by Matt Cheetham http://www.mattcheetham.co.uk/
"Colourama" name by Julian King
Testers: Jennie Lawson Jessica Lawson Steve Lawson Andy Fritz
Icon by Kevin M. Lawson Icon palette is "cheer up emo kid" by electrikmonk. http://www.colourlovers.com/palette/1930/cheer_up_emo_kid http://www.colourlovers.com/lover/electrikmonk http://www.keithparent.com/
The following palettes and patterns may appear in App Store screenshots:
"Giant Goldfish" by manekineko http://www.colourlovers.com/palette/92095/Giant_Goldfish
"Sweetest Taboo" by albenaj ("Apache Convoluted" pattern template by dazzlement) http://www.colourlovers.com/pattern/2894700/Sweetest_Taboo http://www.colourlovers.com/pattern/template/239880/Apache_Convoluted
"cheer up emo kid" by electrikmonk http://www.colourlovers.com/palette/1930/cheer_up_emo_kid
"You're my cuppycake" by GabsGiggles ("StrawberryChocolate" palette by Any Palacios) http://www.colourlovers.com/pattern/1376162/Youre_my_cuppycake http://www.colourlovers.com/palette/1511587/StrawberryChocolate
"LoversInJapan" by lovelyrita http://www.colourlovers.com/palette/867235/LoversInJapan
"cheer up emo kid" and "Sweetest Taboo" and are used in compliance with the CC-BY-SA license. http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
"Giant Goldfish", "You're my cuppycake", and "LoversInJapan" are used in compliance with the CC-BY-NC-SA license. http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/
